recipe: Baked Beans Wash and soak one pound navy beans over night. Boil slowly twenty minutes and drain. Add 1/2 pound salt pork cut in thick slices, 1/4 cup molasses or brown sugar, salt to taste. Over with water and bake in slow oven about six hours. Add water, a little at a time as needed. Mrs. A. Smith. Order of the Eastern Star. Logan Square Chapter No. 560 (Chicago, Ill.).
